summary: The concept is based on a true story concerning an exotic species of eels that are released in the southeast from Asia. They breathe air and can survive on land.
cast: Douglas Swander|Kathleen LaGue|Simon Page|Tim Colceri|Kate Gersten|Brandon Breault|Josh Gad|Matt Holly|Adam McCrory|Max Rhyser|Joshua Rubin|Jack Monroe|Amanda Sickler|Ian Pliske|Joseph P. Genier|Mark Butler|Heather Hills|Paul Di Franco|Gloria Payne|Elsa Wolthausen|Kent Butterworth|Rick Dean|Cowboy Elliott|Dakota Hills|Kelly Kwon|Matthew McGillicuddy|K'Dee Miller|Melissa Noble|Don Williams|Joanna Lara Zuppardi
title: Razortooth
